io.fluxcd.toolkit.source.v1.GitRepositor.description: GitRepository is the Schema for the gitrepositories API.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.source.v1.GitRepositor.description: GitRepositorySpec specifies the required configuration to produce an Artifact for a Git repository.

url.description: URL specifies the Git repository URL, it can be an HTTP/S or SSH address.

ref.description: Reference specifies the Git reference to resolve and monitor for changes.

interval.description: Interval at which the GitRepository URL is checked for updates. This interval is approximate and may be subject to jitter to ensure efficient use of resources.

timeout.description: Timeout for Git operations like cloning, defaults to 60s.

secretRef.description: SecretRef specifies the Secret containing authentication credentials for the GitRepository.

ignore.description: Ignore overrides the set of excluded patterns in the .sourceignore format.

suspend.description: Suspend tells the controller to suspend the reconciliation of this GitRepository.

recurseSubmodules.description: RecurseSubmodules enables the initialization of all submodules within the GitRepository as part of cloning it.

include.description: Include specifies a list of GitRepository resources which Artifacts should be included in the Artifact produced for this GitRepository.

verify.description: Verification specifies the configuration to verify the Git commit signature(s).

io.fluxcd.toolkit.source.v1.GitRepositor.description: GitRepositoryRef specifies the Git reference to resolve and checkout.

branch.description: Branch to check out, defaults to main.

tag.description: Tag to check out, takes precedence over Branch.

semver.description: SemVer tag expression to check out, takes precedence over Tag.

name.description: Name of the reference to check out.

commit.description: Commit SHA to check out, takes precedence over all reference fields.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.source.v1.LocalObjectR.description: LocalObjectReference contains enough information to locate the referenced Kubernetes resource object.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.source.v1.GitRepositor.description: GitRepositoryInclude specifies a local reference to a GitRepository which Artifact should be included.

repository.description: GitRepositoryRef specifies the GitRepository which Artifact contents must be included.

fromPath.description: FromPath specifies the path to copy contents from, defaults to the root of the Artifact.

toPath.description: ToPath specifies the path to copy contents to, defaults to the name of the GitRepositoryRef.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.source.v1.GitRepositor.description: GitRepositoryVerification specifies the Git commit signature verification strategy.

mode.description: Mode specifies what Git object should be verified.

secretRef.description: SecretRef specifies the Secret containing the public keys of trusted Git authors.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.source.v1.GitRepositor.description: GitRepositoryStatus records the observed state of a Git repository.

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the last observed generation of the GitRepository object.

conditions.description: Conditions holds the conditions for the GitRepository.

artifact.description: Artifact represents the last successful GitRepository reconciliation.

lastHandledReconcileAt.description: LastHandledReconcileAt holds the value of the most recent reconcile request value.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.source.v1.Condition.description: Condition contains details for one aspect of the current state of this API Resource.

reason.description: Reason contains a programmatic identifier indicating the reason for the condition's last transition.

message.description: Message is a human readable message indicating details about the transition.

lastTransitionTime.description: LastTransitionTime is the last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration represents the .metadata.generation that the condition was set based upon.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.source.v1.Artifact.description: Artifact represents the output of a Source reconciliation.

path.description: Path is the relative file path of the Artifact.

url.description: URL is the HTTP address of the Artifact as exposed by the controller managing the Source.

revision.description: Revision is a human-readable identifier traceable in the origin source system.

digest.description: Digest is the digest of the file in the form of '<algorithm>:<checksum>'.

lastUpdateTime.description: LastUpdateTime is the timestamp corresponding to the last update of the Artifact.

size.description: Size is the number of bytes in the file.

io.k8s.apimachinery.pkg.apis.meta.v1.Obj.description: ObjectMeta is metadata that all persisted resources must have.

name.description: Name must be unique within a namespace.

namespace.description: Namespace defines the space within which each name must be unique.

labels.description: Map of string keys and values that can be used to organize and categorize objects.

annotations.description: Annotations is an unstructured key value map stored with a resource that may be set by external tools.
